dcterms:creator: Prithviraj Sen
Galileo Namata
Mustafa Bilgic
Lise Getoor
Brian Galligher
Tina Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: Cora is a citation network dataset consisting of documents (nodes) and citations (edges) between them. Each document is represented by a bag-of-words feature vector, and each node has one class label.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: Prithviraj Sen
Galileo Namata
Mustafa Bilgic
Lise Getoor
Brian Galligher
Tina Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: Citeseer is a citation network dataset similar to Cora, consisting of documents (nodes) and citations (edges). Each document is represented by a bag-of-words feature vector, and each node has one class label.
dcterms:title: Citeseer

dcterms:creator: Michael Schlichtkrull
Thomas N. Kipf
Peter Bloem
Rianne van den Berg
Ivan Titov
Max Welling
dcterms:description: DBLP is a heterogeneous citation network dataset containing three types of nodes (papers, authors, conferences) and four types of edges. Each node is represented by a bag-of-words of keywords.
dcterms:title: DBLP

dcterms:creator: Michael Schlichtkrull
Thomas N. Kipf
Peter Bloem
Rianne van den Berg
Ivan Titov
Max Welling
dcterms:description: ACM is a heterogeneous citation network dataset similar to DBLP, containing three types of nodes (papers, authors, subjects) and four types of edges. Each node is represented by a bag-of-words of keywords.
dcterms:title: ACM

dcterms:creator: Michael Schlichtkrull
Thomas N. Kipf
Peter Bloem
Rianne van den Berg
Ivan Titov
Max Welling
dcterms:description: IMDB is a heterogeneous dataset containing three types of nodes (movies, actors, directors) and four types of edges. Each node is represented by a bag-of-words representation of plots, and labels correspond to genres of movies.
dcterms:title: IMDB
